verbose_text: These pathways include (1) replication opposite template U generates transitions at C/G, (2) UNG2 dependent translesion synthesis (TLS) generates transversions at C/G, (3) a hybrid pathway comprising non canonical mismatch repair (ncMMR) and UNG2 dependent TLS generates transversions at C/G, (4) ncMMR generates mutations at A/T, and (5) UNG2- and PCNA Ubiquitination (PCNA-Ub)-dependent mutations at A/T.
